results.title: Metformin use and the risks of herpes zoster and postherpetic neuralgia in patients with type 2 diabetes.
results.text_hl: A higher cumulative dose of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ had further lower risks of @<m>DISEASE_Herpes_Zoster</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006562 @@@herpes zoster@@@ and @DISEASE_Neuralgia_Postherpetic @DISEASE_MESH:D051474 @@@postherpetic neuralgia@@@ than @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ no-use.

citations.NLM: Yen FS, Wei JC, Yip HT, Hsu CC, Hwu CM. Metformin use and the risks of herpes zoster and postherpetic neuralgia in patients with type 2 diabetes. J Med Virol. 2023 Jan;95(1):e28278. PMID: 36329608
citations.BibTeX: @article{36329608, title={Metformin use and the risks of herpes zoster and postherpetic neuralgia in patients with type 2 diabetes.}, author={Yen FS and Wei JC and Yip HT and Hsu CC and Hwu CM}, journal={J Med Virol}, volume={95}, number={1}, pages={e28278}}

results.title: Effectiveness of Metformin in Preventing Herpes Zoster Japanese Patients With Type 2 Diabetes: A Target Trial Emulation.
results.text_hl: Effectiveness of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ in Preventing @<m>DISEASE_Herpes_Zoster</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006562 @@@Herpes Zoster@@@ Japanese @SPECIES_9606 @@@Patients@@@ With @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@Type 2 Diabetes@@@: A Target Trial Emulation.

citations.NLM: Hiroki S, Fukasawa T, Yokogawa K, Kawakami K. Effectiveness of Metformin in Preventing Herpes Zoster Japanese Patients With Type 2 Diabetes: A Target Trial Emulation. J Med Virol. 2025 Sep;97(9):e70606. PMID: 40947657

results.title: Metformin Against Herpes Zoster in Colon Cancer Patients with Type 2 Diabetes: A PSM Analysis.
results.text_hl: Our findings indicate that higher doses of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ correlate with a greater reduction in the risk of @<m>DISEASE_Herpes_Zoster</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006562 @@@herpes zoster@@@.

citations.NLM: Li MC, Chen WM, Shia BC, Wu SY. Metformin Against Herpes Zoster in Colon Cancer Patients with Type 2 Diabetes: A PSM Analysis. J Cancer. 2025;16(4):1054-1065. PMID: 39895800

results.title: Increased Risk of Herpes Zoster in Diabetic Patients Comorbid with Coronary Artery Disease and Microvascular Disorders: A Population-Based Study in Taiwan
results.text_hl: However, there was no significant difference between @<m>DISEASE_Herpes_Zoster</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006562 @@@HZ@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ and non-@<m>DISEASE_Herpes_Zoster</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006562 @@@HZ@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ who took @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ or @CHEMICAL_Sulfonylurea_Compounds @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013453 @@@sulfonylureas@@@ alone.

citations.NLM: Ke CC, Lai HC, Lin CH, Hung CJ, Chen DY, Sheu WH, Lui PW. Increased Risk of Herpes Zoster in Diabetic Patients Comorbid with Coronary Artery Disease and Microvascular Disorders: A Population-Based Study in Taiwan PLoS One. 2016;11(1):e0146750. PMID: 26751202
